lattice

Class ConceptLatticeWriterDot

  • java.lang.Object
    • lattice.ConceptLatticeWriterDot

  • public final class ConceptLatticeWriterDot
extends java.lang.Object

    This class defines the way for writing a concept lattice as a dot file.
